page.title: 08Sarn Village Hall
page.content: Sarn Village Hall is in Powys and was built in 1896.It can hold about 250 people.Every Monday the Young Farmers use it for their meetings.Nearly every fortnight the W.I. members use it for their meetings,and Sarn Show and Sports and Sarn Village Hall Committee hold their meetings there. The Hall is used for Concerts,Dances and Whist Drives.It has a meeting room,Dance hall,a kitchen,two changing rooms and two toilets,Gents and Ladies.It has Central Heating which is run on electricity.The Village Hall was given to Sarn by{Lord Davies}of Llandinam. The Village Hall has a Recreation field where you can play Bowls,Tennis, Rounders,Netball and Football.
